topic.title: Prerequisites
topic.shortdesc: Before you install Couchbase Server, check the supported platforms.

body.p: The Red Hat installation uses the RPM package.
body.note: CentOS 6 and CentOS 7 do not require installation of openSSL since it is already included. You must install openSSL1 only if you are using Couchbase Server 4.x with CentOS 5.
